mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, delete_flag, personal_visit_id, service_id
mapper.select: SELECT t.`service_id`, (SELECT cname FROM res_dict WHERE id=t.`service_id`) AS service_name FROM res_plan_library_personal_visit_service t WHERE t.`delete_flag`=0 AND t.`personal_visit_id`=#{planId}
mapper.insert:
insert into res_plan_library_personal_visit_service
id,
create_time,
update_time,
delete_flag,
personal_visit_id,
service_id,

mapper.update:
update res_plan_library_personal_visit_service
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
personal_visit_id = #{personalVisitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update res_plan_library_personal_visit_service set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, personal_visit_id = #{personalVisitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
